description: This initiative focuses on providing sustainable solutions for the management of used cooking oil. It involves a family-run business that collects, purifies, and exports this oil, adhering to legal requirements and environmental regulations. The company aims to combat illegal practices in the industry, such as the resale of contaminated oil, by offering proper disposal services and certifications to local establishments. Through community engagement and awareness programs, they promote responsible oil management while striving to expand their operations and contribute positively to environmental sustainability.
name: MUNDO ECOSOLUCIONES
